children.name: Control flow complexity
children.description: The computational complexity of the control flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: Data flow complexity
children.description: The complexity of the data flow structure in the code functions.

children.name: OO complexity
children.description: The complexity of the object-oriented architecture and structure. Composed of MDIT (maximum depth of inheritance tree).

children.name: Code documentation
children.description: The amount of documentation in the code: comment rate, javadoc, etc.

children.name: Code size
children.description: The overall size of the code.

children.name: Access points
children.description: The amount of attributes and methods on the class, whatever their visibility is.

children.name: Public access points
children.description: Total number of public classes, interfaces, methods, constructors, annotations and attributes.

children.name: Maximum depth of nesting
children.description: The maximum depth of nesting of the control flow structure found in the function.

children.name: Comment rate
children.description: The ratio of source lines of code on the the number of comment lines of code.

children.name: Number of attributes
children.description: Total number of attributes defined in the class.

children.name: Number of methods
children.description: Total number of methods defined in the class.

children.name: Number of public attributes
children.description: Total number of public attributes defined in the class.

children.name: Number of public methods
children.description: Total number of public methods defined in the class.

children.name: Depth of Inheritance Tree
children.description: Maximum depth of inheritance tree in the artefact.

children.name: Code cloning
children.description: The amount of duplicated lines in the code.

children.name: Source Lines Of Code
children.question: How many source lines of code are there?

children.name: Cyclomatic Complexity
children.description: The number of execution paths found in the function.

children.name: Number of distinct operands
children.description: The number of distinct operands found in the function.

children.name: Number of distinct operators
children.description: The number of distinct operators found in the function.

children.name: Total number of operands
children.description: The total number of operands found in the function.

children.name: Total number of operators
children.description: The total number of operators found in the function.

children.name: Test coverage
children.description: The percentage of source lines of code that is exercised by the tests.

children.name: Number of tests
children.description: The total number of test cases for the product.

children.name: Test success rate
children.description: The percentage of failed tests during the last execution of the test plan.

children.name: Developer ML posts
children.description: Total number of posts on the developer mailing list during the last month.

children.name: Developer ML authors
children.description: Number of distinct authors (according to their email address) on the developer mailing list during last month.

children.name: Developer ML response time
children.description: Median time of first reply to questions in the developer mailing list during last week.

children.name: Developer ML response ratio
children.description: Average number of responses for a question in the developer mailing list during last month.

children.name: Developer ML subjects
children.description: Number of threads in the developer mailing list during last month

children.name: User ML posts
children.description: Total number of posts on the user mailing list during the last month.
children.question: Total number of posts on the user mailing list during the last month.

children.name: User ML authors
children.description: Number of distinct authors (according to their email address) on the developer mailing list during last month.

children.name: User ML response ratio
children.description: Average number of responses for a question in the user mailing list during last month.

children.name: User ML subjects
children.description: Number of threads in the user mailing list during last month

children.name: User ML response time
children.description: Median time of first reply to questions in the user mailing list during last week.

children.name: SCM Documentation
children.description: Is there some documentation about the SCM process, rules and conventions?

children.name: SCM usage
children.description: How much the SCM system was used during last month. Composed of SCM_COMMITS_1M and SCM_COMMITTERS_1M.

children.name: SCM Commits
children.description: Total number of commits registered on the artefact during the last month.

children.name: Files committed
children.description: Total number of files found in all commits that happened during the last month.

children.name: SCM committers
children.description: Total number of different user logins found in commits during last month.

children.name: File stability index
children.description: Average number of commits on files during the last month.

children.name: ITS usage
children.description: How much the ITS system was used during last month. Composed of ITS_ISSUES_OPEN_1M and ITS_ISSUES_OPENERS_1M.

children.name: Median time to fix bug
children.description: Median time between the creation of an bug and its closure. Bugs are identified according to the registered type of issue.

children.name: Number of open bugs
children.description: Number of bugs in an open status at the time of analysis.

children.name: Number of open requests during last month
children.description: Number of change requests in an open status during last month.

children.name: Number of distinct request openers during last month
children.description: Number of bugs in an open status during last month.

children.name: Defect density
children.description: Overall total number of bugs on product divided by 1000's of lines (KLOC).

children.name: License identification
children.description: Is there a list of the different licences used in the product?

children.name: IP log
children.description: Total number of commits registered on the artefact during the last month.

children.name: Project is on time for next milestone
children.description: Is the project on time for the next milestone?

children.name: Number of milestones
children.description: The number of milestones since the last official release.

children.name: Milestone success rate
children.description: What is the percentage of successful milestones over the past 10 milestones?
